post_text: In response to the coronavirus outbreak, the Brooklyn City School District will be closed Monday, March 16th and remain closed for at least three weeks. All staff and faculty will report to schools on Tuesday, March 17th for a professional day in order to prepare for remote learning and instruction during the extended closure. The District is developing a detailed multiple-leveled extended closure plan to support our students. Our draft closure plan includes information on instruction, virtual learning plans, student and staff expectations, distribution of meals for students who receive free or reduced meals and special education supports. Once completed, we will post the District's Extended School Closure Plan on our website. Thank you for your patience as we work through these difficult times.
